Package name.paramonov.doomep.shogi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    This interface acts upon a text input using polymorphism.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bishop  
    BoardPanel
    The JPanel for the shogi board.
    EmptyPiece
    A class representing a tile on which there is no piece.
    GameState
    A class representing the state of the game at any given moment.
    GoldGeneral
    A Class representing a gold general in a game of shogi.
    GraphicUI
    GUI for shogi game.
    King  
    Knight
    A Class representing a knight in a game of shogi.
    Lance
    A Class representing a lance in a game of shogi.
    Pawn
    A Class representing a pawn in a game of shogi.
    Piece
    A Class representing a piece in a game of shogi.
    PieceTest
    A class for testing whether or not the piece classes work.
    PromotablePiece
    An abstract class representing a piece that can promote.
    PromotedBishop  
    PromotedKnight
    A Class representing a promoted knight in a game of shogi.
    PromotedLance
    A Class representing a promoted lance in a game of shogi.
    PromotedPawn
    A Class representing a promoted pawn in a game of shogi.
    PromotedRook  
    PromotedSilverGeneral
    A Class representing a promoted silver general in a game of shogi.
    Rook  
    SilverGeneral
    A Class representing a silver general in a game of shogi.
    TextUI
    A class used for playing shogi in a text user interface.
    UnpromotablePiece
    An abstract class representing a piece that cannot promote.
